How are the funds distributed when a new ID is created on the Verus network?

When a new ID is created on the Verus network, the funds are distributed as follows:

* 20 VRSC to the referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the referrer's referrer's referrer's ID
* 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined
* 100% of all remaining funds go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
What happens to the majority of the funds involved in creating a new ID on the Verus network?
The majority of the funds involved in creating a new ID on the Verus network go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
Who benefits from the creation of a new ID on the Verus network, aside from the referrers?
Aside from the referrers, the miners or stakers of the blockchain benefit from the creation of a new ID on the Verus network. They receive 100% of all remaining funds not paid to referrers.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
